      • ServerMain

        public ServerMain(int objPort,
                  int reqPort,
                  boolean useDB,
                  int rmiPort,
                  java.lang.String rmiName)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new server with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        objPort - socket object port
        reqPort - socket request port
        useDB - true if a database is to be used for the user credentials validation
        rmiPort - rmi port
        rmiName - rmi name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
